definitions.definition: ( transitive , intransitive ) To sweep with a broom.
( roofing ) To improve the embedding of a membrane by using a broom or squeegee to smooth it out and ensure contact with the adhesive under the membrane.
( figurative ) to get rid of someone, like firing an employee or breaking up with a girlfriend, to sweep another out of one's life

main_definition: ( transitive , intransitive ) To sweep with a broom.
secondary_definitions: ( roofing ) To improve the embedding of a membrane by using a broom or squeegee to smooth it out and ensure contact with the adhesive under the membrane.
( figurative ) to get rid of someone, like firing an employee or breaking up with a girlfriend, to sweep another out of one's life

definitions.definition: Alternative form of bream ( “ to clean a ship's bottom ” ) .

main_definition: ( nautical ) Alternative form of bream ( “ to clean a ship's bottom ” ) .
